original_text: And because of the abundance of the milk they give, there will be curds to eat. All who remain in the land will eat curds and honey.
korean_text: 그것들이 내는 젖이 많으므로 엉긴 젖을 먹을 것이라 그 땅 가운데에 남아 있는 자는 엉긴 젖과 꿀을 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: And because of the abundance of the milk they give
there will be curds to eat
All who remain in the land
